overview: Three of the cutest coeds ever to rustle the pom-poms and shake their cute little butts ought to make a nifty cheerleading squad. But Marcy the Head Cheerleader doesn't think so, nor does her vicious taskmaster, Coach Hart. He thinks the only way to shape girls up is to beat them black and blue. The coach, portrayed by nationally renowned bondage master Ernest Green, takes his anger out on Marcy. She's into S&M already, with pierced nipples and a preference for the rod, and doesn't mind being stripped naked and used by the savage coach. Subjected to one of the longest bondage and discipline sessions ever taped, she survives with a renewed passion. Of course, the head cheerleader likes to dish it out as well as take it, and she's got her marching orders from Coach hart. Whip that cheerleading squad into shape or else!
tagline: Will they crack or become crack cheerleaders?
title: Bondage Cheerleaders
